data.text: An e ngʼat moseneno masira
Oseriemba mabor kendo miyo awuotho
chutho osekuma
Osemiyo denda odoko mool
Osegoyona agengʼa kendo lwora
Osemiyo adak ei mudho
Osechiela gi ohinga ma ok anyal ringo madhi;
Kata ka aluongo kata kaywak ka dwaro kony,
Osedino yora gohinga moger gi kidi;
Mana kaka ondieg bungu mobuto karito,
e kaka noywaya oko e yo mokidha
Noywayo atungʼe
Nochwoyo chunya gi aserene
Nabedo ngʼat ma ji duto nyiero,
Osepongʼo chunya
Oseturo lekena gi kite mimuodo
Osemaya kwe;
Emomiyo awacho niya, “Chia mara oserumo
Aparo chandruokna, wuodhena ma ok nikare,
Aparogi maber,
To gima bende aparo
Nikech hera maduongʼ mar Jehova Nyasaye osiko mochwere,
Herani gi ngʼwononi nyien okinyi kokinyi,
Abiro wacho kenda niya, “Jehova Nyasaye e pokna,
Jehova Nyasaye ber ne jogo ma genogi ni kuome,
en gima ber
Ber mondo ngʼato otingʼ jok
We obed kar kende owuon kolingʼ,
We oik wiye ei buru,
We ochiw lembe ne ngʼatno ma digoye
nikech Ruoth Nyasaye ok nyal jwangʼo ngʼato
Kata obedo ni okelo kuyo, to obiro nyiso ngʼwono,
nimar Nyasaye ok kel chandruok goyiem,
Donge Jehova Nyasaye neno kisando ji duto
kata kitamo ngʼato e ratiro mare
kata ka iketho buch ngʼato,
En ngʼa manyalo wuoyo kendo miyo gimoro timre
Donge masiche kod ber wuok mana
Ere gima omiyo ngʼato angʼata mangima ngʼur
Weuru wanon timbewa kendo wapar ane kaka gichalo,
Wachiwuru chunywa kendo watingʼ bedewa malo
Wasetimo richo kendo ngʼanyo,
Iselawowa ka in gi mirima;
Iseumori gi boche polo
Isemiyo wabedo ka yugi
“Wasikwa duto
Luoro gi obadho ritowa
Pi wangʼa mol ka aora
Pi wangʼa biro chwer ma ok chogi,
nyaka chop Jehova Nyasaye nokul wangʼe piny
Gima aneno miyo chunya kuyo
Jogo mane wasika kayiem nono
Negitemo mondo gitiek ngimana ka giluta ei bur;
pi noima mine aparo
Naluongo nyingi, yaye Jehova Nyasaye,
Kane akwayi ni mondo ikonya
Nibiro machiegni kane aluongi
Yaye Ruoth Nyasaye ne itingʼo tingʼna,
Yaye Jehova Nyasaye, iseneno, rach mosetimna,
Iseneno kaka ne gichulona kuor,
Yaye Jehova Nyasaye, isewinjo ayany mag-gi,
ma gin gigo ma joma wasika wacho kuoma
Koro negie nikech kata gibedo piny kata chungo to nyinga
Yaye Jehova Nyasaye, migi kum moromo gi timbegi kaluwore
Mi gibed gi chuny matek
Yaye Jehova Nyasaye, mad ilawgi gi mirima,
